message:
Hello buddies,
I have some questions for my friends who switched from PC to Apple.
- How do you find it?
- What do you think about Macbook Pro 15" or 17''? Do you recommend it for graphic and web design work?
Thanks :)

data.message:
Alright, So I did it since 4 years ago. NOTHING TO COMPARE. Mac is really awesome! Knowing you it will help you a lot making Designs and coding them!

You don't need 17" Macbook Pro. Just get a 13" and Connect it to extra Monitor. One thing I recommend is to buy your Macbook Pro Maximized. and You don't need a Retina Display :)

is there's a 17 inch macbook pro ? I think it's only 13 and 15
And btw I'm thinking of getting one too

And to be honest everything look more beautiful on mac
I can say that most of the apps are higher in quality.. but I'm not a heavy mac user.. so you may want to consider more experienced members :)
That's the Difference of Quality. And Yes there is no 17" Macbook Pro only 13 or 15.
Thanks a lot Mohamed Alaa El Din - I think I will take this step
Yes Muhammed - There is 17" but I found it only in Russia. Mabe there is in Egypt...
You really helped my Mohamed Alaa El Din - I was hesitated..  Do you mean by maximized to buy it with the highest features?
Yeah, 16GB Ram, Flash Drive and i7 Processor.
